SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )

local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_PLAYER ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DETERMINATION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:NotTargetted() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD ) if filter:CountStopAt( 1 ) == 1 then filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) if filter:CountStopAt(1) == 1 then return 1 else return 0 end else return 0 end return 0
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local targetA = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) local targetB = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1):Get_CardPtr(0) if (targetA ~= nil and targetB ~= nil) then if (targetA:GetZone() == ZONE_GRAVEYARD and targetB:GetZone() == ZONE_IN_PLAY) then local damageFromA = targetA:GetCurrentPower() targetB:DealDamage(damageFromA, targetA) targetA:GuidedReveal( ZONE_GRAVEYARD, ZONE_LIBRARY ) targetA:PutInLibrary(0) end elseif (targetA ~= nil and targetB == nil) then if (targetA:GetZone() == ZONE_GRAVEYARD) then targetA:GuidedReveal( ZONE_GRAVEYARD, ZONE_LIBRARY ) targetA:PutInLibrary(0) end end
